pages.text: This is just a place for me to sund off and answer some questions
pages.title: About

pages.text: Over the past few weeks I have been working extracting some of the DNA from CoreOS . It's been an interesting process to see what is needed to create a CoreOS like cluster. What I've found out is you really only need a few programs. CoreOS Parts etcd etcdctl fleet fleetctl Kelsey Hightower Parts confd Linux Requirements docker systemd
pages.title: CoreOS DNA spliced with Debian Wheezy
